extension.description:
Installation instructions: After installing this plugin, sign up for an account at http://trakt.tv. Then..
1. Press c (or rightclick if using a mouse) and select configure 2. Enter in username and password that you have set up on the trakt website and any other configuration you would like 3. Navigate to Home > Programs and activate trakt* (location of trakt activation is skin dependent and may be in other places labeled Addons, Scripts, etc.)
Note: if you do not configure trakt to autostart, you will need to repeat step 5 any time you would like to submit tv shows
